      • updateGame

        public Game updateGame(Game game)
        replaces the current model from the poller, and updates all observers that theres a new model
        Parameters:
        game- - the new model to replace the old model
        Pre:Condition
        game is not null, and is formatted correctly
        Post:Condition
        the current model is replaced with the new one and updates all observers that theres a new model

      • update

        public void update(Game model)
        Updates the game. This also notifies all observers of the ModelFacade.
        Parameters:
        model - the CatanModel
        Pre:Condition
        the model is not null and is valid
        Post:Condition
        All the observers are notified of the change
